name: Eyra, the Crow Maiden
overview: Eyra is a young priestess of the Koruhaurus, the tribe that lives in the temple city of the jungle. She's been trained by the elder mothers to become a wise one and aid their people through knowledge and wisdom. All was peaceful until the evil Infernal Marauder came from far lands across the sea and kidnaps the brave warriors of the tribe. His plan is to experiment on them with forbidden magic and ancient powers that was thought lost in time and turn them into an army of darkness. Now it is up to Eyra and her trusty trained crow, Nunkamah, to embark on a dangerous journey to save them.
